SELECT A.CLIENT_CD , A.RECORD_STATUS , A.COUNSEL_CD , A.COUNSELOR_ID , B.YMD , C.COUNSEL_NM , D.USER_NM as counselorNm , (SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM MIND_COUNSEL_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_CD = C.COUNSEL_DIV) as counselDivNm , DATE_FORMAT(B.YMD, '%Y-%m-%d') as ymdLine , DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT(B.ST_TIME, TIME), '%i:%s') as stTime , DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT(B.ED_TIME, TIME), '%i:%s') as edTime , (SELECT CLIENT_NM FROM MIND_CLIENT WHERE CLIENT_CD = A.CLIENT_CD) as clientNm , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(C.MOBILE),'1234') as mobile FROM MIND_COUNSEL A INNER JOIN MIND_SCHEDULE B ON A.COUNSEL_CD = B.COUNSEL_CD INNER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_INTAKE C ON A.INTAKE_CD = C.INTAKE_CD INNER JOIN MIND_MGR D ON A.COUNSELOR_ID = D.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.STATUS != '100522' /* 취소가 아닌거(예정, 완료, 종결 모두 노출) */ AND A.CENTER_SEQ = #{centerSeq} AND B.YMD LIKE CONCAT ( #{ymd},'%')
AND D.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT PRICE_SEQ as priceSeq , CATEGORY_CD as categoryCd , CLIENT_CD as clientCd , CENTER_SEQ as centerSeq , PRICE_TYPE as priceType , PRICE01 as price01 , PRICE02 as price02 , PRICE03 as price03 FROM MIND_COUNSEL_PRICE WHERE 1=1
AND CENTER_SEQ = #{centerSeq}
SELECT USER_ID AS userId , USER_NM AS userNm FROM MIND_MGR WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND CENTER_SEQ = #{centerSeq }
SELECT COUNSEL_CD as counselCd , INTAKE_CD as intakeCd , EXTENSION_STATUS as extensionStatus FROM MIND_COUNSEL WHERE COUNSEL_CD = #{counselCd}

SELECT A.INTAKE_CD as intakeCd , A.CLIENT_CD as clientCd , A.USER_KEY as userKey , A.CATEGORY_CD as categoryCd , A.CENTER_SEQ as centerSeq , A.COUNSEL_TYPE as counselType , A.COUNSELOR_ID as counselorId , A.COUNSEL_PRICE as counselPrice , A.SCHEDULE_DT as scheduleDt , A.EXTENSION_NUM as extensionNum , B.COUNSEL_NM as counselNm , C.CENTER_NM as centerNm , D.USER_NM as counselorNm , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(B.MOBILE), '1234') as mobile FROM MIND_COUNSEL A INNER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_INTAKE B ON A.INTAKE_CD = B.INTAKE_CD INNER JOIN MIND_CENTER C ON A.CENTER_SEQ = C.CENTER_SEQ INNER JOIN MIND_MGR D ON D.USER_ID = A.COUNSELOR_ID WHERE COUNSEL_CD = #{counselCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MIND_ORDER ( COUNSEL_CD , CLIENT_CD , USER_KEY , ORDER_TYPE , ORDER_DT , ORDER_NM , ORDER_AMT , ORDER_STATUS , PAY_TYPE , CATEGORY_SEQ , SND_NM , SND_MOBILE , SND_EMAIL , REG_ID ) VALUES ( #{counselCd} , #{clientCd} , #{userKey} , '100777' -- 심리상담 , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , (SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM MIND_COUNSEL_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_CD = #{categoryCd}) , '0' , '100960' -- 주문처리중 , null , #{categoryCd} , (SELECT USER_NM FROM MIND_USER WHERE USER_KEY = #{userKey}) , (SELECT MOBILE FROM MIND_USER WHERE USER_KEY = #{userKey}) , (SELECT EMAIL FROM MIND_USER WHERE USER_KEY = #{userKey}) , #{regId} )

/* 매일 9시에 다음날 상담이 있는 고객한테 문자 보낼 주문을 추출 */ SELECT A.ORDER_NUM, E.COUNSEL_NM as sndNm, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(IFNULL(E.MOBILE,A.SND_MOBILE)),'1234') as sndMobile,/* 인테이크에 입력한 휴대폰번호로 메시지가 날라가도록 수정, 인테이크에 입력된 정보가 없으면 주문에 있는 휴대펀번호로 */ B.COUNSELOR_ID, B.COUNSEL_CD, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(B.SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y년%m월%d일%H시') AS scheduleDt, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(B.SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%m월%d일 %H시') AS scheduleDtMonth,
C.TEL_NUM as centerTelNum, C.CENTER_NM as centerNm, C.ADDR1 as centerAddr1, C.ADDR2 as centerAddr2, D.USER_NM as counselorNm, D.MOBILE as counselorMobile, A.CLIENT_CD as clientCd, B.COUNSEL_TYPE AS counselType, B.center_seq as centerSeq, IF(F.SITE_NM IS NULL or F.SITE_NM = '', '상담포유', F.SITE_NM) as siteNm FROM MIND_ORDER A INNER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL B ON A.COUNSEL_CD = B.COUNSEL_CD INNER JOIN MIND_CENTER C ON B.CENTER_SEQ = C.CENTER_SEQ INNER JOIN MIND_MGR D ON B.COUNSELOR_ID = D.USER_ID LEFT JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_INTAKE E ON B.INTAKE_CD=E.INTAKE_CD INNER JOIN MIND_CLIENT F ON A.CLIENT_CD =F.CLIENT_CD WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(B.schedule_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 2 DAY) AND B.CANCEL_DT IS NULL -- 취소가 아니고 AND A.REF_ORDER_NUM IS NULL -- 취소 재주문도 아닌거 AND A.ORDER_STATUS = '100960' AND A.CLIENT_CD != 'police'

/* 매일 9시에 다음날 상담이 있는 고객한테 문자 보낼 주문을 추출 */ SELECT A.ORDER_NUM, E.COUNSEL_NM as sndNm, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(IFNULL(E.MOBILE,A.SND_MOBILE)),'1234') as sndMobile,/* 인테이크에 입력한 휴대폰번호로 메시지가 날라가도록 수정, 인테이크에 입력된 정보가 없으면 주문에 있는 휴대펀번호로 */ B.COUNSELOR_ID, B.COUNSEL_CD, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(B.SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y년%m월%d일%H시') AS scheduleDt, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(B.SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%m월%d일 %H시') AS scheduleDtMonth,
C.TEL_NUM as centerTelNum, C.CENTER_NM as centerNm, C.ADDR1 as centerAddr1, C.ADDR2 as centerAddr2, D.USER_NM as counselorNm, D.MOBILE as counselorMobile, A.CLIENT_CD as clientCd, B.COUNSEL_TYPE AS counselType, B.center_seq as centerSeq, IF(F.SITE_NM IS NULL or F.SITE_NM = '', '상담포유', F.SITE_NM) as siteNm FROM MIND_ORDER A INNER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL B ON A.COUNSEL_CD = B.COUNSEL_CD INNER JOIN MIND_CENTER C ON B.CENTER_SEQ = C.CENTER_SEQ INNER JOIN MIND_MGR D ON B.COUNSELOR_ID = D.USER_ID LEFT JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_INTAKE E ON B.INTAKE_CD=E.INTAKE_CD INNER JOIN MIND_CLIENT F ON A.CLIENT_CD =F.CLIENT_CD WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(B.schedule_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 2 DAY) AND B.CANCEL_DT IS NULL -- 취소가 아니고 AND A.REF_ORDER_NUM IS NULL -- 취소 재주문도 아닌거 AND A.ORDER_STATUS = '100960' AND A.CLIENT_CD = 'police'

SELECT A.ORDER_NUM as orderNum , A.COUNSEL_CD as counselCd , A.ORDER_NM as goodsNm , A.ORDER_AMT as salePrice , A.ORDER_STATUS as goodsStatus , A.ORDER_TYPE as goodsType , A.ORDER_AMT as buyPrice , (SELECT DUTY_YN FROM MIND_COUNSEL A INNER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_INTAKE B ON A.INTAKE_CD = B.INTAKE_CD INNER JOIN MIND_ORDER C ON C.COUNSEL_CD = A.COUNSEL_CD INNER JOIN MIND_CENTER D ON D.CENTER_SEQ = B.CENTER_SEQ WHERE C.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM) as taxYn FROM MIND_ORDER A INNER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL B ON A.COUNSEL_CD = B.COUNSEL_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d') < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND B.CANCEL_DT IS NULL -- 취소가 아니고 AND A.REF_ORDER_NUM IS NULL -- 취소 재주문도 아닌거 AND A.ORDER_STATUS = '100960' AND A.ORDER_TYPE = '100777'
